	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		Column_Name as string,
		Actual_value as string,
		Proposed_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GenderEnumeration
source(output(
		Column_Name as string,
		Actual_value as string,
		Proposed_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MaritalStatusEnumeration
source(output(
		Column_Name as string,
		Actual_value as string,
		Proposed_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PayFrequencyEnumeration
source(output(
		Column_Name as string,
		Actual_value as string,
		Proposed_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StateEnumeration
source(output(
		Column_Name as string,
		Actual_value as string,
		Proposed_Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> UnionStatusEnumeration
LandingTable derive(Gross_Earnings = toDecimal(Gross_Earnings,18,2),
		Pay_Period_Hours = toDecimal(Pay_Period_Hours,18,2),
		Employee_Deferral = toDecimal(Employee_Deferral,18,2),
		Employee_Roth = toDecimal(Employee_Roth,18,2),
		Loan_Payments = toDecimal(Loan_Payments,18,2),
		Employee_After_Tax = toDecimal(Employee_After_Tax,18,2),
		Employer_Match = toDecimal(Employer_Match,18,2),
		Safe_Harbor_Match = toDecimal(Safe_Harbor_Match,18,2),
		Safe_Harbor_Non_Elective = toDecimal(Safe_Harbor_Non_Elective,18,2),
		Qualified_Matching_Contribution = toDecimal(Qualified_Matching_Contribution,18,2),
		Qualified_Non_Elective_Contribution = toDecimal(Qualified_Non_Elective_Contribution,18,2),
		Profit_Sharing = toDecimal(Profit_Sharing,18,2),
		Money_Purchase = toDecimal(Money_Purchase,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_1 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_1,18,2)) ~> DerivedColumnDecimls
DerivedColumnDecimls derive(Contribution_Source_Amount_2 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_2,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_3 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_3,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_4 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_4,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_5 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_5,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_6 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_6,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_7 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_7,18,2),
		Contribution_Source_Amount_8 = toDecimal(Contribution_Source_Amount_8,18,2),
		Loan_Repayment_Amount_1 = toDecimal(Loan_Repayment_Amount_1,18,2),
		Loan_Repayment_Amout_2 = toDecimal(Loan_Repayment_Amout_2,18,2),
		Loan_Repayment_Amount_3 = toDecimal(Loan_Repayment_Amount_3,18,2),
		Loan_Repayment_Amount_4 = toDecimal(Loan_Repayment_Amount_4,18,2),
		Loan_Repayment_Amount_5 = toDecimal(Loan_Repayment_Amount_5,18,2),
		Record_Level_3_Amount = toDecimal(Record_Level_3_Amount,18,2),
		SSN = replace(SSN,'-','')) ~> DerivedColumnDecimals2
DerivedColumnDecimals2 derive(Birth_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Birth_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Birth_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Birth_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Birth_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Birth_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Birth_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Birth_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		Hire_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Hire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Hire_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Hire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Hire_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Hire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Hire_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Hire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		Termination_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Termination_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Termination_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Termination_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Termination_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Termination_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Termination_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Termination_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		Rehire_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Rehire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Rehire_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Rehire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Rehire_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Rehire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Rehire_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Rehire_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		Payroll_End_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Payroll_End_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Payroll_End_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date = iif(isNull((iif(isNull(toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))),toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date,'yyyy-MM-dd'),iif(isNull(toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(Record_Level_2_Payroll_Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy')))) ~> DerivedColumnDates
DerivedColumnDates, GenderEnumeration join(Gender == Actual_value,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GenderEnumerationJoin
GenderEnumerationJoin derive(Gender = iif(isNull(Actual_value), Gender, Proposed_Value)) ~> GenderCombine

GenderSpecificSelect, MaritalStatusEnumeration join(Marital_Status == Actual_value,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MaritalStatusEnumerationJoin
MaritalStatusEnumerationJoin derive(Marital_Status = iif(isNull(Actual_value), Marital_Status, Proposed_Value)) ~> MaritalStatusCombine
MaritalStatusCombine select(mapColumn(
		Landing_Contribution_Data_ID,
		File_received_ID,
		Inbound_File_Setup_ID,
		Paylocity_Company_Code,
		Check_Date,
		SSN,
